subject: Team meeting notes - December 10
body:
Hi team,

Attached are the notes from today's meeting. Key action items:
- Sarah: Complete Q4 report by Friday
- Mike: Schedule client call for next week
- All: Review budget proposal before Thursday

Let me know if you have any questions.

Best,
John
label: benign

subject: Re: Project timeline update
body:
Thanks for the update, Lisa.

The revised timeline looks good. I've blocked off the review sessions on my calendar. Looking forward to seeing the final designs.

Best regards,
David
label: benign

body:
This Week in Tech

subject: Invoice #INV-2024-1847 from Acme Consulting
body:
Dear Client,

Please find attached invoice #INV-2024-1847 for consulting services rendered in November 2024.

Amount Due: $4,500.00
Due Date: December 30, 2024

Payment methods accepted:
- Bank transfer (details on invoice)
- Check payable to Acme Consulting

Thank you for your business.

Accounts Receivable
Acme Consulting
label: benign

subject: Lunch tomorrow?
body:
Hey!

Want to grab lunch tomorrow? I was thinking that new Thai place on Main St. Let me know if 12:30 works.

- Sarah
label: benign

subject: Q4 Budget Review
body:
Hi all,

Please review the attached Q4 budget summary before our meeting on Thursday. We're tracking 3% under budget overall, but marketing spend is slightly over.

Let's discuss optimization opportunities.

Thanks,
Finance Team
label: benign

subject: Reminder: Your appointment tomorrow
body:
This is a reminder that you have an appointment with Dr. Johnson tomorrow at 10:00 AM.

Location: 123 Medical Center Drive, Suite 200

Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete paperwork.

To reschedule, call (555) 123-4567.
label: benign

subject: Welcome to the team!
body:
Hi Alex,

Welcome aboard! We're thrilled to have you join our engineering team. Your first day is Monday, January 6th.

Please bring a photo ID and arrive at 9 AM. HR will meet you in the lobby.

Looking forward to working with you!

Best,
Mike
label: benign
